soot.toDex

Class RegisterAssigner

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.toDex.RegisterAssigner

  •  class RegisterAssigner
extends java.lang.Object
    Assigns final register numbers in instructions so that they fit into their format and obey the calling convention (that is, the last registers are for the parameters).

    Note that the final instruction list can contain additional "move" instructions.

    IMPLEMENTATION NOTE: The algorithm is heavily inspired by com.android.dx.dex.code.OutputFinisher.

                    java.util.Map<Insn,Stmt> insnsStmtMap,
                    java.util.List<LocalRegisterAssignmentInformation> parameterInstructionsList)
        Reserves low registers in case we later find an instruction that has short operands. We can then move the real operands into the reserved low ones and use those instead.
        Parameters:
